What is the role of the &LocalizeRingForHomalg; package in the &homalg; project?
The &homalg; project aims at providing a general and abstract framework for homological computations. This Package enables homalg to extend commutative rings to their localizations at maximal ideals.

The Math behind this package
The math behind this package is a simple trick in allowing global computation to be done instead of local computations. So no new algorithms are implemented. Details can be found in the paper .
